dota.items.item_blink.description:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.



Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3.0 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
dota.items.item_overwhelming_blink.descr:
Active: Overwhelming Blink

Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.



After teleportation, all enemies in a [object Object] AoE take damage equal to 100 + 50% of your strength and an additional 100% over time, and have 50% movement speed slow and 50 attack speed slow for 6 seconds.



Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for 3.0 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
dota.items.item_swift_blink.description:
Active: Swift Blink

Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.



After teleportation, you gain 40% phased movement speed and +35 Agility for 6 seconds.



Swift Blink cannot be used for 3.0 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
dota.items.item_arcane_blink.description:
Active: Arcane Blink

Teleport to a target point up to 1400 units away.



After teleportation, you restore 200 health and 100 mana.



Arcane Blink cannot be used for 3.0 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
dota.items.item_javelin.description:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.
dota.items.item_quelling_blade.descripti:
Active: Chop Tree

Destroy a target tree.



Cast Range: 350

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 8 for melee heroes, and 4 for ranged.
dota.items.item_infused_raindrop.descrip:
Passive: Magical Damage Block

Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage.



Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
dota.items.item_wind_lace.description: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
dota.items.item_stout_shield.description:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.
dota.items.item_moon_shard.description:
Use: Consume

Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

Passive: Shade Sight

Grants bonus night vision.
dota.items.item_branches.description:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.



Range: 400
dota.items.item_lifesteal.description:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 40%.
dota.items.item_voodoo_mask.description:
Passive: Spell Lifesteal

Spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.



Lifesteal reduced against creeps.
dota.items.item_boots.description: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
dota.items.item_gem.description:
Active: Reveal

Gives True Sight over a 300 radius revealing wards and units even in Fog of War.

Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
dota.items.item_cheese.description:
Use: Fondue

Instantly restores 2500 health and 1500 mana.
dota.items.item_magic_stick.description:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.



Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
dota.items.item_magic_wand.description:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.



Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.
dota.items.item_ghost.description:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for 4.0 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and 40% more vulnerable to magic damage.
dota.items.item_clarity.description:
Use: Replenish

Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds.



If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.



Range: 250
dota.items.item_famango.description:
Use: Eat Lotus

Instantly restores 125 health and mana.



Range: 400
dota.items.item_great_famango.descriptio:
Use: Eat Lotus

Instantly restores 400 health and mana.



Range: 400
dota.items.item_greater_famango.descript:
Use: Eat Lotus

Instantly restores 900 health and mana.



Range: 400
dota.items.item_blood_grenade.descriptio:
Use: Throw Grenade

Throw a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take 50 damage on impact, and be slowed by 15% and take 15 damage every 1s for 5 seconds. Radius [object Object].
dota.items.item_flask.description:
Use: Salve

Grants 30 health regeneration to the target for 13 seconds.



If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.



Heals for half the amount when cast on an ally.



Range: 250
dota.items.item_dust.description:
Use: Reveal

For 12 seconds, creates an area that reveals and slows invisible heroes by 20% in a [object Object] radius where the caster was standing. Invisible units revealed by dust take 25 damage.



The debuff effect on enemies lingers for 8s after leaving the area of effect.
dota.items.item_bottle.description:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore 110 health and 60 mana over 2.7 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.



The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.



Hold Control to use on an allied hero.



Range: 350

Passive: Store Rune

Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 90 seconds.



Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
dota.items.item_ward_observer.descriptio:
Use: Plant

Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.



Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.



Range: 500
dota.items.item_ward_sentry.description:
Use: Plant

Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 1000 radius.

Lasts 7 minutes.



Does not grant ground vision.

Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.



Range: 500
dota.items.item_ward_dispenser.descripti:
Use: Plant

Plant the currently active ward. Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.



Range: 500
dota.items.item_ward_dispenser.effect: <item>OBSERVER VISION RANGE:</item><item>OBSERVER DURATION (MINUTES):</item><item>SENTRY DURATION (MINUTES):</item><item>SENTRY TRUE SIGHT RANGE:</item>
dota.items.item_tango.description:
Use: Devour

Consumes a target tree to gain 7.0 health regeneration for 16.0 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.



Comes with 3 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.



Tree Range: 165
dota.items.item_tango_single.description:
Use: Devour

Consumes a target tree to gain 7.0 health regeneration for 16.0 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.



Tree Range: 165
dota.items.item_courier.description:

dota.items.item_flying_courier.descripti:

Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.



Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
dota.items.item_tpscroll.description:

After channeling for 3.0 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.



Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
dota.items.item_travel_boots.description:

Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
dota.items.item_travel_boots_2.descripti:

Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown, channel time and does not consume a charge on usage. Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

dota.items.item_phase_boots.description:

Active: Switch Attribute

Switches between an additional +24 Strength, +24 Agility, or +24 Intelligence, and provides the bonuses corresponding with that parameter.

Intelligence

Once fully charged, deals 125 to 2 random targets in 700 range every 4 seconds.

Strength

Once fully charged an attack has a 20% chance to deal 80 bonus damage and root the target for 1.0 seconds. 4s Cooldown.

Agility

Once fully charged, when attacked, the hero has a 20 to counter-attack a target within their attack range. 4s Cooldown.
dota.items.item_hermes_sandals.descripti:
Active: Greater Phase

When activated, the user cannot be slowed or rooted. Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 4.0 seconds. Does not dispel roots that are already in place. Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
dota.items.item_hermes_sandals.effect: <item>+ <value>50</value> Movement Speed</item><item>+ <value>20</value> Damage (MELEE)</item><item>+ <value>20</value> Damage (RANGED)</item><item>+ <value>5</value> Armor</item><item>+ <value>30</value> Agility</item>

Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 6 seconds, allows you to make 5 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.
